name: SoccerFactz
0:
”Alexa, ask Soccer Factz to tell me a soccer fact.”
”Alexa, tell Soccer Factz to give me a soccer fact.”
”Alexa, open Soccer Factz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: soccer facts
des:
For all you Soccer Geeks out there, Soccer Factz tells you Fascinating, Rare and Interesting Facts about Soccer, or Football, as you might call it. 
Stay Tuned for more Amusing once the skill gets updated !
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
